about_the_game:
Kings Origin is a dark medieval fantasy simulation game where you control a king ruling his territory in a world filled with mythical creatures, dangerous alliances, and ancient secrets. Manage resources, build your kingdom, and face unique challenges to secure your reign.

Rule as a monarch, providing supplies for your subjects, managing an impenetrable defense to protect them, and attracting new adventurers by creating a prosperous kingdom.

  • Create the perfect workflow so that your servants are happy with your kingdom and don't leave.

  • Raise your walls and fortifications, making your kingdom an impregnable bastion.

  • Subsidize missions so that adventurers want to stay and get extra protection.

Assign jobs to your servants depending on whether they are of low, middle or high birth. From the most necessary jobs like lumberjacks, to the most difficult ones like knights.

Appoint high-born noble knights to lead your men. Add banners, swordsmen, archers and create diverse groups for each confrontation.

Rule as a monarch, providing supplies for your subjects, managing an impenetrable defense to protect them, and attracting new adventurers by creating a prosperous kingdom.

  • Create the perfect workflow so that your servants are happy with your kingdom and don't leave.

  • Raise your walls and fortifications, making your kingdom an impregnable bastion.

  • Subsidize missions so that adventurers want to stay and get extra protection.

Assign jobs to your servants depending on whether they are of low, middle or high birth. From the most necessary jobs like lumberjacks, to the most difficult ones like knights.

Appoint high-born noble knights to lead your men. Add banners, swordsmen, archers and create diverse groups for each confrontation.
name: Kings Origin

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3210
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 capable GPU
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon R7 265
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
